## Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

### Information about this ACAN

#### Title
- English Title: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
- French Title: Préavis d'adjudication de contrat (PAC)

#### Contract Reference Information
- Reference Number: SSC-23-00022836:T
- Solicitation Number: BPM018892/22836

#### Tender Status and Closing Date Information
- Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
- Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-09T14:00:00 (UTC)

#### Description
This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the supply of the Arena Simulation Software. The intention of this notice is to indicate that Shared Services Canada (SSC) intends to award a contract for this software to a pre-identified supplier. 

The SSC Client Support Center (CSC) launched a modernization project to address the significant increase in operational volumes, which are expected to grow by over 90% in three years, while also mandating an increase in accessibility rate from 25% to 50-60%. The CSC identified the need to use a process simulator to understand the risks and impacts of these changes downstream.

The CSC has previously leased Arena process simulator licenses through SimWell to complete a pilot project to confirm access to necessary operational data.

### Instructions to Respond

- Interested Suppliers must submit a Statement of Capabilities through the Purchase Portal (P2P) prior to the closing date and time, as specified above.
- Suppliers must register in the SSC P2P portal to view and access solicitations, submit responses, receive updates and amendments, be awarded contracts, receive contract amendments, and submit invoices.

### Additional Instructions

- For information on registering on the P2P portal, visit https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca and click "Register Now".
- Requires access to microcomputers ONLY, as per N7030AG SUB-GSO NIBS entities definition.

### Next Steps

- Further information on the procurement process and requirements may be obtained by contacting the following SSC representative:
  - Name: Eric Lavigne
  - Email: [eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
  - Phone Number: 343-541-8756
  - Fax Number: 613-960-6026
